description: Binder transaction buffer exceeded (1MB limit). Occurs when passing large data between app components via Intent/Bundle.
commonCauses: Passing large Bitmap in Intent extras
Activity result with large data payload
solutions: Pass data ID/URI instead of full object
Store large data in ViewModel or repository
Use shared preferences or database for transfer
Pass file URI instead of bitmap data
Split large operations into smaller chunks
prevention: Never pass Bitmaps in Intent extras
Use ViewModels for sharing data between fragments
Pass IDs and fetch data in destination
Implement content providers for large data
examples: navController.navigate(R.id.dest, bundleOf("id" to objectId)) // Pass ID only
